entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:49 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 70%
